items.title: Our Legacy
items.description: The journey of Navana Real Estate (NRE) began 28 years ago with a vision to redefine the real estate landscape in Bangladesh. Founded in 1996, NRE emerged as the flagship company of the Navana Group and continues to stand as a beacon of innovation.

items.title: Design Excellence
items.description: Recognized as a Super Brand, NRE excels in unconventional building design, crafting iconic structures that inspire and redefine urban living through innovation and precision.

items.title: Brand Evolution
items.description: In 2024, NRE reimagined its brand with a new logo, mission, and vision—reinforcing its commitment to sustainability, technology, and future-ready architecture.

items.title: Future Vision
items.description: The tagline 'BROADDEN LIFE BOUNDARIES' reflects NRE’s dedication to elevating lifestyles and shaping the future of real estate with forward-thinking design.
